englishText:
What can I do? I am nothing without you. Like an old robot, my heart stops and is always cold. What can we do? You are nothing without me. You would be struggling just like me. What can we do, us?

Baby, I want to keep our warmth as it is. No one can untangle us. Tell me, my you, tell me, my you. Please talk to me inside of me. I am struggling in your heart. I suddenly feel scared.

What can I do? I am nothing without you. I don’t have a home to lean on comfortably. My insides are empty for you. It may seem a little hard, but I’m always standing here. You can feel at ease.

Cuz I'm your home, home, home, home. Cuz I'm your home, home, home, home. Cuz I'm your home, home, home, home.

A place where you can cry. A place where you can come.
koreaText:
내가 뭘 어쩌겠어 나는 너가 없으면 낡은 로봇처럼 맘이 멈추고 늘 차가워. 우린 뭘 어쩌겠어 너는 내가 없으면 Yeh 나랑 똑같이 힘들 텐데 뭘 어쩌겠어 우리 Yeh.

Baby 우리의 따뜻함을 그대로 간직하고 싶어. 어떤 누구라도 우리 사이 풀지 못해서. Tell me 나의 너 Tell me 나의 너 말 좀 해줘 내 안에서. 난 네 마음 안에서 발버둥 치고 있어. 덜컥 겁이 나는 걸.

어쩌겠어 난 너가 없으면 내 마음 편히 기댈 집이 없어. 내 속은 너를 위해 비어있어. 어찌보면 조금 어렵겠지만 언제라도 난 여기 서 있어. 편하게 생각해도 돼.

Cuz I'm your home home home home. Cuz I'm your home home home home. Cuz I'm your home home home home.

네가 울 수 있는 곳. 네가 올 수 있는 곳.
